title: Bitcoin giant praises Pakistan’s bold digital economy plans
description: Michael Saylor, Executive Chairman of Strategy (formerly MicroStrategy), praised Pakistan’s bold steps in adopting digital assets and innovation. He attended a key meeting in Islamabad with Finance Minister Muhammad Aurangzeb and Minister of State for Crypto and Blockchain Bilal Bin Saqib. The discussion focused on how Bitcoin can support Pakistan’s economy, improve financial resilience, and […]
